dt: {bc}of, relating to, situated near, or involving the {d_link|anus|anus}

{bc}of, relating to, characterized by, or being the stage of {d_link|psychosexual|psychosexual} development which follows the oral stage {dx_def}see {dxt|oral:1||3}{/dx_def} and during which the child is concerned especially with his or her feces

{bc}of, relating to, characterized by, or being personality traits (such as {d_link|parsimony|parsimony}, meticulousness, and ill humor) considered typical of fixation at the anal stage of development {bc}{sx|anal-retentive||}
often used in nontechnical contexts to describe someone as extremely or excessively neat, careful, or precise

dt.t: I have a mania for neatness in some matters that is almost {wi}anal{/wi}.

et: borrowed from New Latin {it}ānālis,{/it} from Latin {it}ānus{/it} {et_link|anus|anus} + {it}-ālis{/it} {et_link|-al:1|-al:1}
shortdef: of, relating to, situated near, or involving the anus
of, relating to, characterized by, or being the stage of psychosexual development which follows the oral stage and during which the child is concerned especially with his or her feces

of, relating to, characterized by, or being personality traits (such as parsimony, meticulousness, and ill humor) considered typical of fixation at the anal stage of development : anal-retentive —often used in nontechnical contexts to describe someone as extremely or excessively neat, careful, or precise

dt: {bc}the psychological state or quality of being anal

shortdef: the psychological state or quality of being anal

dt: {bc}exhibiting or typifying personality traits (such as frugality and obstinacy) held to be psychological consequences of toilet training

dt.t: Overextending psychic energy during the process of toilet training by holding back can result in fixating at the anal stage, creating an {wi}anal retentive{/wi} personality as an adult. The anal retentive personality is characterized by the tendency to cope with conflicts later in life by demonstrating an extreme sense of cleanliness and orderliness, such as dusting furniture or waxing the car when troubled.

dt: often used in nontechnical contexts to describe someone as extremely or excessively neat, careful, or precise

dt.t: … is his father's clone—intense, focused, fuddy-duddy, severely {wi}anal-retentive{/wi}, or as Archie puts it, "a neat freak."

utxt.t: {wi}Anal-retentives{/wi} hoping to use PCs to organize their lives …

… maybe it's my {wi}anal retentiveness{/wi}, my futile attempts to bring order to a chaotic world. Who knows? All I know is there's no more beautiful sight than firewood stacked in long, perfect rows.

shortdef: exhibiting or typifying personality traits (such as frugality and obstinacy) held to be psychological consequences of toilet training —often used in nontechnical contexts to describe someone as extremely or excessively neat, careful, or precise
